result.reason: Reducing the resize debounce delay in RdpProtocol8.cs from 300ms to 100ms improves perceived responsiveness during window resizing while still preventing excessive reconnections.
result.approach: Decrease the debounce timer interval in `RdpProtocol8.cs` constructor from 300ms to 100ms.
